author: jed
msg: Flesh out a system for tracking contributions, and licensing of such.
I have created a base, similar to how the Linux kernel does things, for tracking
who owns a specific driver or moving part.  Comments are welcome.
Also added LICENSE.MIT to cover Linode's contributions in the future.

author: polvi
msg: Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/tdavis/libcloud into tdavis

author: tom
msg: Rackspace's host property doesn't use self.connect()
Using connect() would cause recursion issues when coupled with an
edit which attempts to add a default Host header. So it doesn't use that
